attributes.action: Seek Supreme Court declaration if Art. 50 trigger needs Act of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
It may be helpful to read the following
https://ukconstitutionallaw.org/2016/06/27/nick-barber-tom-hickman-and-jeff-king-pulling-the-article-50-trigger-parliaments-indispensable-role/
attributes.background: The triggering of Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty will render void the European Communities Act 1972.  In general, the voiding of a UK statute should occur by statute rather than prerogative.  We ask the new Prime Minister seek a declaration from the Supreme Court if an Act of Parliament is required

rejection.details: The Supreme Court is independent of Government and Parliament.
